title: How to draw a circle when a button is clicked.[QUESTION]
body: I want to draw a circle only after I click a button. How can i access the canvas to draw on the click event.

comments.author: charlesroddie
comments.body: For example, on the click event, in your view mutate a parameter from false to true, and when painting to the surface (DrawInSurface or PaintSurface), draw the circle if the parameter is true.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: @nakulashok Did @charlesroddie's suggestion work for you? I am closing this now as that is the correct way to achieve that goal.
